page.title: 09RELIGION
page.content: In Port Talbot there are many Churches and Chapels.There are different beliefs ranging from Christian , Catholic,Methodist,and there are a number of different religions which have no places of worship to goto within our area. There is a ROUND CHAPEL in Margam which is said to be the second of it's kind in the world,and the only one in Great Britain (this is one of a few buildings of historic interest).The only Catholic Church in Margam is OUR LADY OF MARGAM and is one of the most popular Churches and supports many of Margam's population. In general the religious trends are the same as else where in the country, showing a drop in active worship. This is even more dramatic in this area because it was once very religious indeed.
